tasks.label: Build & Run (mac, GCC)
args: if ! /opt/homebrew/bin/g++-15 -v >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo Install GCC with: brew install gcc; exit 1; fi; mkdir -p "${workspaceFolder}/build" && /opt/homebrew/bin/g++-15 -std=c++17 -O2 -Wall "${file}" -o "${workspaceFolder}/build/${fileBasenameNoExtension}" && "${workspaceFolder}/build/${fileBasenameNoExtension}" < "${workspaceFolder}/build/input.txt" > "${workspaceFolder}/build/output.txt"
